ioedata.actuator.service

Interface ActuatorService


  • public interface ActuatorService
    This interface provides methods about actuator services, such as actuator registration and getting actuator information of specific devices.
    Author:
    ajou

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isActuatorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId actuatorSerialNum)
      Check whether the actuator already exists by using actuator serial number.
      boolean isActuatorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum, java.lang.String actuatorName)
      Check whether the actuator already exists by using device serial number and actuator name.
      org.bson.types.ObjectId registerActuator(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String userWifiSsid, java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String actuatorType, java.lang.String actuatorName)
      Register new actuator to a specific device.
      ActuatorValue retrieveActuatorInfo(java.lang.String actuatorSerialNum)
      Retrieve actuator information by actuator serial number.
      ActuatorValue retrieveActuatorInfo(java.lang.String deviceSerialNum, java.lang.String actuatorName)
      Retrieve actuator information by device serial number and actuator name.
      java.util.List<ActuatorValue> retrieveActuatorList(org.bson.types.ObjectId deviceSerialNum)
      Get list of all actuators attached to a device.

      Get actuator serial number by actuator name and device serial number.

      • isActuatorExist

        boolean isActuatorExist(org.bson.types.ObjectId actuatorSerialNum)
